events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.
events.description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.

events.name: Raw material extraction
events.wd_description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.
events.description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.

events.name: t: Lithium mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.

events.name: t: Cobalt mining
events.wd_description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.
events.description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.

events.name: t: Nickel mining
events.wd_description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.
events.description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.

events.name: Production
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.

events.name: t: Cell production
events.wd_description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.
events.description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.

events.name: t: Assembly
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.
events.description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: t: Pyrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.

events.name: t: Hydrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.

events.name: t: Direct recycling
events.wd_description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.
events.description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.

events.name: Sanctions on North Korean citizens by South Korea, December 2023
events.wd_label: Sanctions on North Korean citizens by South Korea, December 2023
events.wd_description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean citizens linked to nuclear and missile development through arms trade, cyberattacks, and other illicit activities, following a recent intercontinental ballistic missile test by North Korea.
events.description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean citizens linked to nuclear and missile development through arms trade, cyberattacks, and other illicit activities, following a recent intercontinental ballistic missile test by North Korea.

events.name: Recent missile test by North Korea
events.wd_label: Recent missile test by North Korea
events.wd_description: North Korea recently fired an intercontinental ballistic missile, an action condemned by South Korea and the United States as a violation of UN Security Council resolutions.
events.description: North Korea recently fired an intercontinental ballistic missile, an action condemned by South Korea and the United States as a violation of UN Security Council resolutions.

events.name: Sanctioned individuals and entities
events.wd_description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean individuals, including Ri Chang Ho and Yun Chol, for their involvement in nuclear development, arms trade, and cyberattacks.
events.description: South Korea sanctioned eight North Korean individuals, including Ri Chang Ho and Yun Chol, for their involvement in nuclear development, arms trade, and cyberattacks.

events.name: International response and condemnation
events.wd_description: The missile test and subsequent sanctions were strongly condemned by South Korea and the United States, as part of ongoing international efforts to curb North Korea's weapons program.
events.description: The missile test and subsequent sanctions were strongly condemned by South Korea and the United States, as part of ongoing international efforts to curb North Korea's weapons program.

events.name: Samsung SDI and Hyundai Motor EV Battery Supply Deal
events.wd_label: Samsung SDI and Hyundai Motor EV Battery Supply Deal
events.wd_description: Samsung SDI will supply Hyundai Motor with electric vehicle batteries for seven years starting 2026, marking the first battery supply deal between the two companies.
events.description: Samsung SDI will supply Hyundai Motor with electric vehicle batteries for seven years starting 2026, marking the first battery supply deal between the two companies.

events.name: Supply Deal Announcement
events.wd_description: Samsung SDI announced a supply deal with Hyundai Motor to provide electric vehicle batteries for seven years starting in 2026.
events.description: Samsung SDI announced a supply deal with Hyundai Motor to provide electric vehicle batteries for seven years starting in 2026.

events.name: Battery Supply Details
events.wd_description: Samsung SDI will supply prismatic batteries manufactured at its factory in Hungary for Hyundai Motor's EVs targeting the European market from 2026 through 2032.
events.description: Samsung SDI will supply prismatic batteries manufactured at its factory in Hungary for Hyundai Motor's EVs targeting the European market from 2026 through 2032.

events.name: t: Target Market
events.wd_description: The batteries supplied by Samsung SDI will be for Hyundai Motor's EVs targeting the European market.
events.description: The batteries supplied by Samsung SDI will be for Hyundai Motor's EVs targeting the European market.

events.name: t: Production Location
events.wd_description: The batteries will be manufactured at Samsung SDI's factory in Hungary.
events.description: The batteries will be manufactured at Samsung SDI's factory in Hungary.

events.name: Investment Plans
events.wd_description: Samsung SDI plans to invest 2.7 trillion won to build a second joint EV battery plant with Stellantis in Indiana, targeting to start production in 2027.
events.description: Samsung SDI plans to invest 2.7 trillion won to build a second joint EV battery plant with Stellantis in Indiana, targeting to start production in 2027.

events.name: Market Impact
events.wd_description: Shares of Samsung SDI were trading up 0.3% versus the benchmark KOSPI's 0.1% fall as of 0203 GMT.
events.description: Shares of Samsung SDI were trading up 0.3% versus the benchmark KOSPI's 0.1% fall as of 0203 GMT.
